job.title: Remote Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtmodis is hiring for multiple software engineers on a direct hire basis these software engineers will have the opportunity to work for a growing team a brief synopsis of the requirements and responsibilities are provided belowampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtworking as part of an agile development team drives feature implementation from planning to releaseltligtltligtconfers with the product management team and fellow development team members to gain understanding of needed changes or modifications of existing programs resolves questions of program intent data input output requirements and inclusion of internal checks and controlsltligtltligtwrites and maintains programming documentation understands and implements rolespecific information security access and responsibilitiesltligtltligtensures safety and confidentiality of data and systems by adhering to the organizations information security policiesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtrequirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtbachelors degree in computer science information technology or equivalent experienceampnbspltligtltligt years developing full stack web applications using javascript frameworks such as nodejs express vuejs or other similar javascript toolsltligtltligt years working with database technologies such as mysql or microsoft sqlltligtltligt handson software development experience with a major subset of web technologies such as rest api multitiered solutions html css and interacting with various web serversltligtltligtexperience with bootstrap responsive fluid design frameworks a plusltligtltligtexperience with software development concepts such as objectoriented programming testing and debugging software and software deploymentltligtltligtunderstanding of systems security data protection and data privacyltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
